Uses of Package
com.graphql_java_generator.plugin

Packages that use com.graphql_java_generator.plugin 
Package Description
com.graphql_java_generator.plugin  
com.graphql_java_generator.plugin.generate_code  
com.graphql_java_generator.plugin.generate_schema

  • Classes in com.graphql_java_generator.plugin used by com.graphql_java_generator.plugin 
    Class Description
    AddRelayConnections
    This method add the relay capabilities into the GraphQL schema, as it has been read by DocumentParser.
    CodeTemplate
    Enumeration that defines the available templates for code generation
    CodeTemplateScope
    Enumeration that defines the CodeTemplate available scopes
    ResourceSchemaStringProvider
    Overrides the GraphQLJavaToolsAutoConfiguration#schemaStringProvider() bean, to loads our graphqls files, from the given schemaFilePattern plugin parameter
  • Classes in com.graphql_java_generator.plugin used by com.graphql_java_generator.plugin.generate_code 
    Class Description
    CodeTemplate
    Enumeration that defines the available templates for code generation
    DocumentParser
    This class generates the Java classes, from the documents.
    Generator
    This class is responsible for the generation of the sources and/or resources, depending on the Goal/Task.
    PluginExecutor
    This class is responsible for the execution of the goal/task.
  • Classes in com.graphql_java_generator.plugin used by com.graphql_java_generator.plugin.generate_schema 
    Class Description
    CodeTemplate
    Enumeration that defines the available templates for code generation
    DocumentParser
    This class generates the Java classes, from the documents.
    PluginExecutor
    This class is responsible for the execution of the goal/task.
    ResourceSchemaStringProvider
    Overrides the GraphQLJavaToolsAutoConfiguration#schemaStringProvider() bean, to loads our graphqls files, from the given schemaFilePattern plugin parameter
  • Classes in com.graphql_java_generator.plugin used by com.graphql_java_generator.plugin.language.impl
